stories.Title: A glimpse of Gemini
stories.Description: Even with a delayed launch, Google remains committed to impressing us with a preview of Gemini, its highly anticipated generative AI chatbot. A calculated move to stay ahead in the AI race.
stories.Tweet: A glimpse of Gemini 📦 Even with a delayed launch, Google remains committed to impressing us with a preview of Gemini, its highly anticipated generative AI chatbot. A calculated move to stay ahead in the AI race. #google https://gizmodo.com/google-chatgpt-competitor-gemini-could-preview-soon-1851071756

stories.Title: Alliance of giants
stories.Description: To ensure responsible and safe innovation in AI while promoting open communities, IBM and Meta have joined forces to create the AI Alliance, along with 50+ organizations, including Intel and NASA.
stories.Tweet: Alliance of giants 📦 To ensure responsible and safe innovation in AI while promoting open communities, IBM and Meta have joined forces to create the AI Alliance, along with 50+ organizations, including Intel and NASA. #ai https://www.engadget.com/meta-and-ibm-form-open-source-alliance-to-counter-big-ai-players-104847131.html

stories.Title: Don’t believe the hype
stories.Description: Brad Lightcap, COO of OpenAI, recognizes the magnetic pull of AI for businesses aiming to boost capabilities. However, an important point often overlooked is that AI isn't a miracle worker.
stories.Tweet: Don’t believe the hype 📦 Brad Lightcap, COO of OpenAI, recognizes the magnetic pull of AI for businesses aiming to boost capabilities. However, an important point often overlooked is that AI isn't a miracle worker. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/12/4/23988019/openai-enterprise-hype-chatgpt-lightcap

stories.Title: Copilot goes turbo
stories.Description: Microsoft is ready to enhance Copilot's features with the power of OpenAI's GPT-4 Turbo. With an extended 128K context window, the assistant is getting better at resolving queries.
stories.Tweet: Copilot goes turbo 📦 Microsoft is ready to enhance Copilot's features with the power of OpenAI's GPT-4 Turbo. With an extended 128K context window, the assistant is getting better at resolving queries. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/12/5/23989052/microsoft-copilot-gpt-4-turbo-openai-models-code-interpreter-feature

stories.Title: Easy video generation
stories.Description: Runway ML, the AI video startup, has teamed up with Getty Images, granting it access to vast data to train its models. This partnership aims to simplify content creation for enterprises.
stories.Tweet: Easy video generation 📦 Runway ML, the AI video startup, has teamed up with Getty Images, granting it access to vast data to train its models. This partnership aims to simplify content creation for enterprises. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/runway-ml-is-partnering-with-getty-images-on-new-ai-video-models-for-hollywood-and-advertising/

stories.Title: More inclusive tech
stories.Description: Microsoft's groundbreaking app, Seeing AI, designed for visually impaired users, is now available on Android. This tool helps them engage with their surroundings through audio descriptions.
stories.Tweet: More inclusive tech 📦 Microsoft's groundbreaking app, Seeing AI, designed for visually impaired users, is now available on Android. This tool helps them engage with their surroundings through audio descriptions. #ai https://www.zdnet.com/article/microsoft-seeing-ai-app-lands-on-android-to-help-blind-and-visually-impaired-users/

stories.Title: A bit of a challenge
stories.Description: NASA is facing complexities linked to data access. Cryogenic fluid management tech, vital for space missions, is hindered by current contracting mechanisms with the companies involved.
stories.Tweet: A bit of a challenge 📦 NASA is facing complexities linked to data access. Cryogenic fluid management tech, vital for space missions, is hindered by current contracting mechanisms with the companies involved. #NASA https://spacenews.com/data-rights-limitations-affecting-nasa-technology-development/

stories.Title: Beyond the moon landing success
stories.Description: India's lunar journey with Chandrayaan 3 isn't over yet! The country's space agency recently announced the return of the propulsion module to Earth's orbit in its quest for additional insights.
stories.Tweet: Beyond the moon landing success 📦 India's lunar journey with Chandrayaan 3 isn't over yet! The country's space agency recently announced the return of the propulsion module to Earth's orbit in its quest for additional insights. #space https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/12/india-reveals-that-it-has-returned-lunar-spacecraft-to-earth-orbit/

stories.Title: Meet the Urban
stories.Description: To promote affordable mobility, Toyota unveiled the Urban electric SUV Concept, showcased at the Kenshiki forum. The concept focuses on maximizing interior space and offers two battery options.
stories.Tweet: Meet the Urban 📦 To promote affordable mobility, Toyota unveiled the Urban electric SUV Concept, showcased at the Kenshiki forum. stories.Title: Expanding its EV portfolio
stories.Description: In collaboration with BYD, Toyota offers a stylish alternative to traditional SUVs with the Sport Crossover concept, set to hit the roads in 2025.
stories.Tweet: Expanding its EV portfolio 📦 In collaboration with BYD, Toyota offers a stylish alternative to traditional SUVs with the Sport Crossover concept, set to hit the roads in 2025. #toyota https://electrek.co/2023/12/04/toyota-sport-crossover-ev-made-with-byd-launch-2025/

title: Gemini sneak peek, IBM and Meta's alliance, Is AI overhyped?
description: Yesterday, we announced that Google’s Gemini was slightly delayed. But guess what? They're reportedly giving us a glimpse at the chatbot's skills this week. Is it going to outshine GPT-4? IBM and Meta have taken matters into their own hands with the establishment of the AI Alliance, a collaboration between giants to advance open-source AI. And, plot twist, OpenAI's COO thinks the tech might be a bit overhyped, especially in the business world.
